snippet: Jonathan Gray, the Blackstone Group's global head of real estate, and his wife have donated $25 million to their alma mater, the University of Pennsylvania, to finance a new center for cancer mutation research, The New York Times reports.
abstract: Jonathan Gray, the Blackstone Group's global head of real estate, and his wife have donated $25 million to their alma mater, the University of Pennsylvania, to finance a new center for cancer mutation research, The New York Times reports.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Blackstone's Gray Donates $25 Million to Penn for Cancer Research
